name: Suingu
description:
Controls:
-[A] to move left
-[D] to move right

- Hover your mouse over a platform and hold left mouse button to swing to it. Let go of left mouse button to fly with your momentum!

Team:
Zacharie Hong - Movement Mechanics, Programmer
Lucas Tay - Sound Designer, Artist
Sng Peng Hwee - Level Generation, Programmer
